value:
Non-union in 3 of 15 osteotomies of the distal
radius without bone graft

comment: The study included 15 patients and followed them until radiographic and clinical healing, suggesting a prospective design.

value: Non-union occurred in 3 of 15 osteotomies of the distal radius without bone graft, particularly when a trapezoid defect was created. This suggests reconsideration of bone grafting.
comment: The study found a concerning rate of non-union (3 out of 15 cases) in distal radius osteotomies performed without bone grafting.
